title: YOLOatr : Deep Learning Based Automatic Target Detection and Localization in Thermal Infrared Imagery
summary: Automatic Target Detection (ATD) and Recognition (ATR) from Thermal Infrared (TI) imagery in the defense and surveillance domain is a challenging computer vision (CV) task in comparison to the commercial autonomous vehicle perception domain.
